item.text: Brotherly love must continue.

Do <st data-num="3361" class="">not</st> <st data-num="1950" class="">neglect</st> <st data-num="5381" class="">hospitality</st> <st data-num="1063" class="">because</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">through</st> <st data-num="3778">it</st> <st data-num="5100" class="">some</st> have <st data-num="3579" class="">entertained</st> <st data-num="32" class="">angels</st> <st data-num="2990">without knowing</st> it.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="3403" class="">Remember</st> <st data-num="1198">those in prison</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> though you were <st data-num="4887">in prison with</st> them,<n id="1" /> and those <st data-num="2558" class="">ill-treated</st> <st data-num="5613" class="">as</st> though you, <st data-num="2532" class="">too</st>, <st data-num="1510" class="">felt</st> <st data-num="846" class="">their</st> <st data-num="4983" class="">torment</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="1062" class="">Marriage</st> must be <st data-num="5093" class="">honored</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">among</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> the <st data-num="2845" class="">marriage bed</st> kept <st data-num="283" class="">undefiled</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st> will <st data-num="2919" class="">judge</st> <st data-num="4208">sexually immoral people</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3432" class="">adulterers</st>.
Your conduct must be free from the love of money, and you must be content with what you have, for he has said, “I will never leave you and I will never abandon you.”
So we can say with confidence, “The Lord is my helper, and I will not be afraid. What can people do to me?”

<st data-num="3421" class="">Remember</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2233" class="">leaders</st>, <st data-num="3748" class="">who</st> <st data-num="2980" class="">spoke</st> <st data-num="2316">God’s</st> <st data-num="3056" class="">message</st> to <st data-num="4771" class="">you;</st> <st data-num="333" class="">reflect</st> on the <st data-num="1545" class="">outcome</st> of their <st data-num="391" class="">lives</st> and <st data-num="3401" class="">imitate</st> their <st data-num="4102" class="">faith</st>.

<st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="5547" class="">Christ</st> is the <st data-num="846" class="">same</st> <st data-num="5504" class="">yesterday</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="4594" class="">today</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="1519 165">forever</st>!

Do <st data-num="3361">not</st> be <st data-num="3911">carried away</st> by <st data-num="4164">all sorts</st> of <st data-num="3581" class="">strange</st> <st data-num="1322" class="">teachings</st>.<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> it is <st data-num="2570" class="">good</st> for the <st data-num="2588" class="">heart</st> to be <st data-num="950" class="">strengthened</st> by <st data-num="5485" class="">grace</st>, <st data-num="3756" class="">not</st> ritual <st data-num="1033" class="">meals</st>,<n id="2" /> <st data-num="3739" class="">which</st> have <st data-num="3756" class="">never</st> <st data-num="5623" class="">benefited</st> those who <st data-num="4043" class="">participated</st> in them.

We <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> an <st data-num="2379" class="">altar</st> that those who <st data-num="3000" class="">serve</st> in the <st data-num="4633" class="">tabernacle</st> <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="1849" class="">right</st> to <st data-num="2068">eat</st> <st data-num="1537" class="">from</st>.

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> the <st data-num="4983" class="">bodies</st> of <st data-num="3778" class="">those</st> <st data-num="2226" class="">animals</st> whose <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st> the <st data-num="749">high priest</st> <st data-num="1533" class="">brings</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="1519" class="">into</st> the <st data-num="40">sanctuary</st> as an offering <st data-num="4012" class="">for</st> <st data-num="266" class="">sin</st> are <st data-num="2618" class="">burned</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="3925" class="">camp</st>.

<st data-num="1352" class="">Therefore</st>, <st data-num="2443" class="">to</st> <st data-num="37" class="">sanctify</st> the <st data-num="2992" class="">people</st> <st data-num="1223" class="">by</st> <st data-num="2398">his own</st> <st data-num="129" class="">blood</st>, <st data-num="2424" class="">Jesus</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">also</st> <st data-num="3958" class="">suffered</st> <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="4439" class="">camp</st>.

We must <st data-num="1831">go out</st> <st data-num="4314" class="">to</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st>, <st data-num="5106">then</st>, <st data-num="1854" class="">outside</st> the <st data-num="3925" class="">camp</st>, <st data-num="5342" class="">bearing</st> the <st data-num="3680" class="">abuse</st> <st data-num="846">he</st> experienced.<n id="1" />

<st data-num="1063" class="">For</st> <st data-num="5602" class="">here</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> <st data-num="3756" class="">no</st> <st data-num="3306" class="">lasting</st> <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st>, <st data-num="235" class="">but</st> we <st data-num="1934" class="">seek</st> the <st data-num="4172" class="">city</st> that is <st data-num="3195">to come</st>.

<st data-num="1223" class="">Through</st> <st data-num="846" class="">him</st> <st data-num="3767">then</st> let us <st data-num="1223 3956">continually</st> <st data-num="399">offer up</st> a <st data-num="2378" class="">sacrifice</st> of <st data-num="133" class="">praise</st> to <st data-num="2316" class="">God</st>, <st data-num="3778" class="">that</st> <st data-num="1510" class="">is</st>, the <st data-num="2590" class="">fruit</st> of our <st data-num="5491" class="">lips</st>, <st data-num="3670" class="">acknowledging</st> <st data-num="846" class="">his</st> <st data-num="3686" class="">name</st>.
And do not neglect to do good and to share what you have, for God is pleased with such sacrifices.

Obey your leaders and submit to them, for they keep watch over your souls and will give an account for their work. Let them do this with joy and not with complaints, for this would be no advantage for you.

<st data-num="4336" class="">Pray</st> <st data-num="4012">for</st> <st data-num="1473" class="">us</st>, <st data-num="1063" class="">for</st> we are <st data-num="3982" class="">sure</st> <st data-num="3754" class="">that</st> we <st data-num="2192" class="">have</st> a <st data-num="2570" class="">clear</st> <st data-num="4893" class="">conscience</st> and <st data-num="2309" class="">desire</st> to <st data-num="390" class="">conduct</st> ourselves <st data-num="2573" class="">rightly</st> <st data-num="1722" class="">in</st> <st data-num="3956">every respect</st>.
I especially ask you to pray that I may be restored to you very soon.
Now may the God of peace who by the blood of the eternal covenant brought back from the dead the great shepherd of the sheep, our Lord Jesus,
equip you with every good thing to do his will, working in us what is pleasing before him through Jesus Christ, to whom be glory forever. Amen.
Now I urge you, brothers and sisters, bear with my message of exhortation, for in fact I have written to you briefly.

You should <st data-num="1097" class="">know</st> that<n id="1" /> <st data-num="1473" class="">our</st> <st data-num="80" class="">brother</st> <st data-num="5095" class="">Timothy</st> has been <st data-num="630" class="">released</st>. <st data-num="1437" class="">If</st> he <st data-num="2064" class="">comes</st> <st data-num="5036">soon</st>, <st data-num="3739">he</st> will be <st data-num="3326">with</st> me when I <st data-num="3708">see</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st>.<n id="2" />

<st data-num="782" class="">Greetings</st> to <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">your</st> <st data-num="2233" class="">leaders</st> <st data-num="2532" class="">and</st> <st data-num="3956" class="">all</st> the <st data-num="40" class="">saints</st>. <st data-num="3588">Those</st> <st data-num="575" class="">from</st> <st data-num="2482" class="">Italy</st> <st data-num="782" class="">send</st> <st data-num="4771" class="">you</st> <st data-num="782" class="">greetings</st>.
Grace be with you all.
